snippet: Ricky Tibbs and his daughter, Alexis, have struggled to cope with the separate deaths of Mr. Tibbs’s wife and his 1-year-old son in 2010.
abstract: Federation of Protestant Welfare Agencies, beneficiary of the New York Times Neediest Cases Fund, provides assistance to Ricky Tibbs and his daughter Alexis, who have struggled following the deaths of two family members and the loss of their home.
lead_paragraph: Ricky Tibbs and his daughter, Alexis, have struggled to cope with the separate deaths of Mr. Tibbs’s wife and his 1-year-old son in 2010.

headline.seo: With Broken Hearts, a Father and Daughter Press On
headline.main: A Father and Daughter Press On With Broken Hearts
